alert.note: Alert for Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 9:25AM PST until December 19 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches, with the highest amounts along the crest. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel along I-84 will be impacted by snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
